message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MA, cs.SI. 

The paper proposes a mechanism design framework to induce efficient and fair equilibrium in games, which falls under the category of game theory (cs.GT). The framework involves taxation, which can be seen as a form of resource allocation and optimization, and thus may also be relevant to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the implementation of the framework in specific games, which suggests a focus on multi-agent systems (cs.MA) and social and information networks (cs.SI).
